name: F-EYE GLOW
short_description:
Introducing our latest eye Formulation for Microneedling procedures, a Cutting-edge solution Engineered to target a range of Under-eye concerns with Precision and Efficacy.

– Tetrapeptide at the heart of this Eormulation Renowned for its ability to combat Glycation, Vascular permeability, and lipid accumulation, the trifecta responsible for under-eye issues, particularly dark circles. This remarkable ingredient works Diligently to restore vitality to the delicate under-eye region.
– Hyaluronic acid in high concentration, a moisture-retaining marvel. This ingredient hydrates and plump the skin, leaving it rejuvenated, effectively reducing fine lines and wrinkles for a more youthful appearance.
– Fibroblast growth factor further enhances our formulation’s potency. It plays a pivotal role in stimulating collagen production, thereby addressing fine lines and wrinkles to promote firmer and smoother skin.

Several anatomical factors, including excess orbital fat, especially in men, contribute to the aesthetic concern of under-eye bags. The lower eyelid comprises three fat compartments that progressively protrude with age, resulting in visible eye bags. Concurrently, weakened skin that supports these compartments and elevated fluid buildup, fueled by heightened capillary permeability, may exacerbate under-eye puffiness.

The persistence of under-eye darkness is primarily attributed to colored compounds stemming from blood permeation, such as bilirubin. These compounds become more conspicuous due to the increased skin transparency caused by tissue deterioration.
Clinically proven active ingredients fortify our formulation, delivering exceptional results to the eye contours’ delicate area and targeting dark circles.

Contact us for official distributors informations.

name: F-XFC
short_description:
Revitalization of the skin begins with our F-XFC formula, a potent booster with over 63 active ingredients designed to rejuvenate your skin. It stimulates metabolism within skin cells, including energy production, protein synthesis, and cellular growth. Our exclusive blend ensures revitalization by providing essential nutrients for the Krebs cycle. This cycle is vital for ATP generation, enhancing skin functions.


Notably, the epidermis lacks blood vessels, relying solely on the passive diffusion of plasma from the dermis to nourish its cells. As the skin ages, its circulatory system becomes less efficient, resulting in a deficiency of nutrients and oxygen. This formula addresses these deficiencies and works to revitalize and support the skin’s health and vitality.


Contact us for official distributors informations.

name: F-NIACINAMIDE
short_description:
Niacinamide (Vitamin B3) is renowned for its versatility and exceptional benefits for the skin, it works on multiple fronts to enhance your complexion.

– Niacinamide inhibits melanin transfer from melanocytes to skin cells, which may reduce pigmentation.
-Reduces the production of melanin and promotes a more even distribution of pigment in the skin, leading to a brighter and more uniform complexion.
-Strengthens the skin’s natural barrier function by increasing the production of ceramides, lipids that help retain moisture and protect the skin.
– Thanks to Niacinamide, the skin actively wards off aggressors causing pigmentation issues.
-Regulates sebum production, reducing the likelihood of acne breakouts and the subsequent development of pigmentation issues.
-Neutralizes harmful free radicals that can damage skin cells and contribute to pigmentation problems. By protecting the skin from oxidative stress, niacinamide helps maintain a more even and youthful complexion.
– Widely researched, Niacinamide has proven benefits in numerous studies on skin care. Clinically proven to brighten the skin, reduce acne and blemishes, improve the skin barrier, and rebalance the skin’s microbiome.

Contact us for official distributors informations.

name: F-MESOMATRIX
short_description:
Our team has expertly designed the F-MESOMATRIX formula to proactively tackle aging skin issues. It specializes in reducing deep wrinkles, scars, and stretch marks. The formula combines growth factors from both epidermal and fibroblast origin with key ingredients like centella asiatica extract, hyaluronic acid, and organic silicium. Together, they refresh and revitalize stem cells, leading to new cell growth and a revved-up cellular metabolism.

Every application of F-MESOMATRIX treatment promises noticeable results. Users will see their skin reclaiming its firmness, youthfulness, and overall health with continuous use.

Centella asiatica, also known as “cica,” “tiger grass,” or “tiger herb,” is a treasure in pharmaceuticals for skin repair. It quickly mends and reinstates skin integrity post-damage. Recognized for its considerable role in skin care, particularly after medical treatments, it accelerates the healing of damaged skin and bolsters skin remodeling.

Able to enhance skin density and tackle stretch marks, our products infused with centella asiatica are perfect for post-procedure care. They promote swift recovery after intensive skin treatments. This includes therapies like laser treatments, chemical peels, and meso-needling, which can impact the skin’s structure and resilience.

 

Contact us for official distributors informations.

name: F-HYDRALIX
short_description:
F-HYDRALIX is our innovative product expressly formulated to combat skin dryness and restore volume.  Acetyl hexapeptide-37 in F-HYDRALIX boosts skin hydration by upregulating AQP3. AQP3 serves as an integral membrane protein that eases the movement of water across tissue layers. By elevating AQP3 levels, F-HYDRALIX enhances the moisture flow from the epidermis’ basal layer to the outer stratum corneum, leading to visibly replenished skin.

Research shows Acetyl hexapeptide-37 raises skin’s moisture by up to 131%.

In addition to Acetyl hexapeptide-37, this product also contains hyaluronic acid and sodium lactate, both of which contribute to its hydrating properties. Hyaluronic acid is well-known for its ability to bind water, helping to keep the skin hydrated. Sodium lactate, on the other hand, not only aids in retaining moisture but also promotes skin renewal, reducing transepidermal water loss.  F-HYDRALIX’s ingredients keep skin hydrated and fresh, ideal for skincare routines.


Contact us for official distributors informations.

name: F-GLOW LIFT
short_description:
F-GLOW LIFT tackles multiple skin concerns, including dark spots, uneven tone, deep wrinkles, and sagging. UV exposure often triggers a complex process called skin pigmentation, primarily caused by stimulated melanocytes.

The melanogenesis process involves three key steps: melanosome formation, melanin synthesis, and melanosome transport. The final result is the distribution of synthesized melanin from mature melanosomes to neighboring keratinocytes in the upper skin layers, leading to pigmented skin.The formula of F-GLOW LIFTIt incorporates a synergy of potent ingredients that act at various levels to achieve these skin improvements:Inhibition of Melanin Production:Inhibition of melanin-generating enzymes such as tyrosinase, TRP-1, and TRP-2.Inhibition of Melanosome Transport: Down-regulation of melanophilin, which is involved in melanosome transport within skin cells.F-GLOW LIFT combines glutathione, vitamin C, niacinamide, and tranexamic acid to target melanin production and distribution, evening skin tone and preventing dark spots.

Additionally, the formula includes hyaluronic acid, DMAE, FGF (fibroblast growth factor), and organic silicium, which work on fibroblasts to provide an intense firming effect on the dermis.

This action helps to prevent wrinkles and skin sagging, promoting a more youthful appearance.

With consistent use, F-GLOW LIFT can significantly enhance skin tone, reduce the appearance of dark spots, and provide impressive long-term results.

For maximum and lasting benefits, it is recommended to use this treatment in combination with Meso-shield 50, which offers UV protection and helps maintain the achieved improvements in the skin.Q&AContact us for official distributors informations.

name: F-ANTI-OX
short_description:
F-ANTI-OX, our powerful product, is specifically formulated to combat free radicals, photo-aging, and hyperpigmentation. F-ANTI-OX features Superoxide dismutase, vital for neutralizing harmful oxygen molecules in cells, preventing damage. These enzymes expedite crucial chemical reactions within the body. Superoxide dismutase is not merely potent against free radicals and oxidative stress; it also aids in tissue repair and reduces inflammation.

F-ANTI-OX incorporates both Vitamin C and glutathione in its formulation, potent antioxidants renowned for their pigmentation reduction and collagen production enhancement capabilities. The addition of sodium pyruvate, an energy source for cellular metabolism, actively stimulates collagen synthesis. This combination of antioxidants works synergistically to strengthen the body’s natural antioxidant defenses, providing enhanced protection against oxidative stress and its damaging effects on the skin.

Contact us for official distributors informations.

name: F-HA
short_description:
Hyaluronic acid stands as the ultimate treatment for addressing extreme dryness, deep static wrinkles, and loss of volume in the skin. This natural polysaccharide boasts remarkable properties, further enhanced by the specific high molecular weight form that we utilize. This formulation delivers immediate and long-lasting results, making it a valuable ally in the battle against skin aging.

Dehydration and the loss of firmness are telltale signs of skin aging, often leading to the development of wrinkles and sagging in various facial areas. The application of hyaluronic acid is instrumental in maintaining skin moisture and firmness.

Hyaluronic acid achieves these benefits through several mechanisms:

– Improving Cellular Cohesion: It enhances cellular cohesion, reducing transepidermal water loss and helping the skin retain its moisture barrier.

– Stimulating Collagen I Synthesis: Hyaluronic acid promotes the synthesis of collagen type I, a key structural protein that contributes to skin elasticity and firmness.

As a result of these actions, the skin gradually tightens and becomes well-hydrated. The outcome is a more youthful, attractive appearance characterized by skin that is both supple and firm.

Contact us for official distributors informations.

name: F-HAIR
short_description:
F-HAIR is a revitalizing hair treatment that offers a comprehensive solution to various hair concerns. It aims to revitalize hair, addressing issues like thinning hair and hair loss.

This effective formula incorporates several key components to achieve its goals:

– Centella Asiatica and Ginkgo Extracts: These extracts have vasodilatory activity, meaning they promote the dilation of blood vessels. As a result, they increase blood flow to the scalp, enhancing the nutrition and oxygenation of the scalp, which is crucial for healthy hair growth.

– Metabolites: F-HAIR contains essential metabolites, including vitamins, amino acids, and minerals, that are vital for the nutritional and energetic metabolism of hair. Ensuring an adequate supply of these nutrients supports the overall health of the hair.

– Organic Silica: Organic silica plays a role in firming the dermal matrix, helping to maintain strong hair anchoring to the scalp. This contributes to the prevention of hair loss.

-Hyaluronic Acid: Included for its hydrating qualities, it softens hair and promotes a healthy look.

By combining these elements, F-HAIR provides a well-rounded approach to hair revitalization, addressing multiple aspects of hair health, from circulation to nutrition and anchoring. This treatment aims to improve the overall condition of the hair, making it look and feel healthier and more vibrant.

Contact us for official distributors informations.

name: F-PERFECT LIPS
short_description:
F-PERFECT LIPS targets specific needs to define, volumize, and enrich lip color. F-PERFECT LIPS achieves its objectives firstly by incorporating key ingredients like hyaluronic acid and acetyl hexapeptide-38.Hyaluronic Acid: Known for its plumping abilities, Hyaluronic acid enhances lip volume and hydration. Additionally, when applied topically, it significantly helps to plump the lips and enhance their overall appearance.Acetyl Hexapeptide-38: This peptide has a specific target action, which involves enhancing the rate of adipogenesis. In adipogenesis, fat cells form and accumulate lipids actively.Moreover, by stimulating peroxisome proliferator-activated receptor Gamma coactivator 1a (PGC-1a) expression, this peptide actively promotes adipogenesis, leading to increased lipid accumulation and volume growth, particularly in the lips.VEGF (Vascular Endothelial Growth Factor): VEGF plays a role in boosting cutaneous (skin) blood micro-circulation. This increased blood flow can provide intense coloration to the lips, enhancing their natural hue and appearance.Combined, these ingredients work to create fuller, more defined, and beautifully colored lips, making “Perfect Lips” an effective product for those looking to enhance their lip appearance.

name: F-SLIM LIFT
short_description:
F-SLIM LIFT formula is an advanced skin booster enriched with over 65 active ingredients. It is built upon the foundation of our renowned F-XFC formula, with the addition of caffeine and hyaluronic acid. The primary objective of this product is to supply skin cells while simultaneously addressing and reducing the appearance of facial fat deposits in a safe manner.

This exclusive blend encompasses all the essential nutrients and molecules integral to the Krebs cycle, which play a vital role in energy production (ATP) and boosting overall skin functions. Notably, the epidermis lacks blood vessels, relying solely on passive diffusion of plasma from the dermis to nourish its cells. However, with aging, the skin often experiences a deficiency of nutrients and oxygen due to a less efficient circulatory system.

The addition of caffeine in the formula serves to stimulate adipocytes, encouraging them to release their fat content. This action contributes to a slimmer appearance of the face, all within the realm of safety and efficacy.

Contact us for official distributors informations.

name: F-EYE CONTOUR
short_description:
F-EYE CONTOUR is designed for the delicate eye area to combat bags, circles, wrinkles, sagging, and dryness. With its inclusive approach, it eliminates the need for multiple products, each targeting a different problem. Its potent blend of peptides, hyaluronic acid, caffeine, organic silica, and vitamin C synergizes to offer remarkable results, revitalizing and enhancing the beauty of the eye contour.

– Peptides and Hyaluronic Acid: Peptides reinforce firmness, increase moisture, and reduce wrinkles, helping to improve the overall appearance of the skin around the eyes.

– Caffeine: Caffeine plays a role in activating the elimination of excess fluids and blood-originated pigments that contribute to dark circles. It also has anti-redness properties, which can be reduced around the eyes.

– Organic Silica and Vitamin C: These ingredients work together to restore the dermal matrix and firm the skin, promoting a more youthful appearance.

– Acetyl Tetrapeptide-5: This peptide specifically targets mechanisms that lead to edema (swelling) and offers a decongestant effect. It enhances elasticity and smoothness in the delicate eye area.

– Hexapeptide-10: This firming active promotes cellular activity in both keratinocytes and fibroblasts. It increases the synthesis of important proteins like laminin-5, alpha-6-integrin, and hemidesmosomes, strengthening the connection between the epidermis and dermis. Over time, this enhanced adhesion helps maintain skin elasticity.

Together, these ingredients form a unique synergy that addresses multiple concerns in the eye area, leaving the skin looking more youthful, refreshed, and enlightened.

Contact us for official distributors informations.

name: F-MELACLEAR
short_description:
F-MELACLEAR is a remarkable treatment designed specifically for addressing dark spots on the skin. This product is formulated for use on very localized facial areas, targeting specific areas of concern. The key component of this formula is tranexamic acid, which plays a crucial role in reducing pigmentation and achieving a more even skin tone.

Tranexamic acid works in the skin by inhibiting UV-induced plasmin activity in keratinocytes. It does so by preventing the binding of plasminogen to keratinocytes, leading to a reduction in melanocyte tyrosinase activity. This inhibition ultimately contributes to the lightening of dark spots and pigmentation. Importantly, tranexamic acid is suitable for all skin types.

To enhance the effectiveness of tranexamic acid, F-MELACLEAR combines it with other safe and effective skin lightening ingredients, including resorcinol, glutathione, niacinamide, and arbutin. These ingredients work together to further reduce pigmentation, whiten the skin, and minimize the appearance of spots.

For optimal and long-lasting results, it is recommended to use F-MELACLEAR in conjunction with Meso-shield 50, which provides protection from UV damage and helps maintain the achieved skin improvements.

Contact us for official distributors informations.

name: F-RADIANCE
short_description:
F-RADIANCE is an exceptional treatment Formulated to effectively reduce the appearance of dark spots, even out skin tone, and enhance skin Radiance without causing skin Irritations. Melanocyte Stimulation, often a result of UV exposure, primarily triggers the complex process of Pigmentation, key to the F-RADIANCE protocol.

Melanogenesis, the formation of melanin, involves three major processes: Melanosome formation, Melanin Synthesis, and Melanosome transport. Mature Melanosomes produce melanin and then actively transfer it to Neighboring keratinocytes, resulting in Pigmented skin.F-RADIANCE Addressing pigmentationF-RADIANCE combines the Synergistic actions of Glutathione, vitamin C, Peptides, and Thioredoxin growth factor, Addressing pigmentation concerns at various levels:Inhibition of Melanin-Generating Enzymes: Ingredients Inhibits enzymes involved in melanin production, including Tyrosinase, TRP-1, and TRP-2. Reducing the activity of these enzymes actively slows down the synthesis of melanin.Inhibition of Melanosome Transport: Ingredients Down-regulates melanophilin, a protein involved in the transport of melanin-Containing melanosomes within skin cells. This Inhibition Disrupts melanosome transport, Preventing the spread of melanin.Enhanced Skin Renewal: Retinol in the formula Accelerates the mitosis (cell division) of basal cells, Promoting faster skin Turnover. As a result, Keratinocytes laden with melanin are shed more quickly, Contributing to a reduction in Pigmentation.Results broughtWith consistent use, F-RADIANCE visibly delivers impressive long-term results. To achieve maximum and long-lasting benefits, using Meso-shield 50 is essential. It protects the skin from further UV damage and maintains the results, a crucial step in the F-RADIANCE treatment plan.

Contact us for official distributors informations.

name: F-XBC
short_description:
F-XBC is the ultimate treatment for achieving the perfect body and reducing localized fat deposits. It acts on various mechanisms to diminish the appearance of cellulite, stimulate lipolysis, promote drainage, and firm the skin. Only by addressing all of these biological processes can successful results be achieved, especially in the case of cellulite.

Vectorized hyaluronidase, along with artichoke and ginkgo biloba extracts, help eliminate accumulated fluids carrying toxins, resulting in a reduction in volume and the sensation of heavy legs. Vectorized lipase and caffeine stimulate adipocytes to release fat through lipolysis, while L-carnitine promotes fat burning. To complete the process, melitotus strengthens blood vessels to prevent new cellulite formation, and cica extract firms the skin to reduce flaccidity resulting from weight loss.

Contact us for official distributors informations.

name: F-ARTICHOKE
short_description:
F-ARTICHOKE, also known as Artichoke or Cynara scolymus, is renowned for its centuries-old application in traditional medicine, specifically targeting liver and gallbladder issues. Utilizing F-ARTICHOKE aids in mobilizing fatty deposits in the liver, supports detoxification processes, and acts as a natural agent in lowering cholesterol levels.

Cynarin has demonstrated properties that combat oxidative stress induced by inflammatory mediators. Additionally, it exerts a degree of control over lipolysis, promoting the synthesis of energy-transporting enzymes NAD-NADH2 and NADP-NADPH2.

Artichoke also acts as a diuretic and vasoconstrictor, stimulating the lymphatic drainage system. F-ARTICHOKE actively mobilizes fat stores from tissues like white adipose tissue, which then releases these fats into the bloodstream for subsequent elimination from the body.

Contact us for official distributors informations.

name: F-CARNITINE
short_description:
F-CARNITINE, a molecule formed from two essential amino acids (lysine and methionine), plays a vital role in muscle function. Certain cell protein shuttles fatty acids into mitochondria, cell’s power source. These fats burn here for energy, supporting heart and muscle health.

F-CARNITINE deficiency hinders fat transport, limiting its burning in energy centers. Because of fat buildup, the skin becomes orange peel-like and develops cellulite. This can lead to a number of health concerns. With more L-Carnitine, the body burns more fat, potentially leading to weight loss, increased energy, and better resistance to cold and fatigue.

Low L-Carnitine messes up how the body moves fat to burn for energy. This can lead to fat buildup, causing cellulite and lumpy “orange peel” skin. In contrast, having more L-Carnitine helps the body use more fat for fuel, which can lead to weight loss, more energy, and better resistance to feeling cold and tired.

Contact us for official distributors informations.

name: F-GINKGO
short_description:
F-GINKGO, a specially formulated supplement, offers a convenient way to harness the power of this natural extract. Ginkgo leaves contain two main groups of compounds: flavonoids and terpenes, which form the basis for its effects. Ginkgo’s most significant effect is on the circulatory system.

Ginkgo flavonoids directly dilate the micro-capillaries, thereby increasing blood circulation. Ginkgo Biloba reduces capillary permeability and exhibits noticeable anti-edematous and anti-varicose effects. Additionally, it has a eutrophic effect on connective tissue, enhancing the synthesis of collagen along the vessel walls. Ginkgo biloba acts as an anti-inflammatory and veinotonic agent.

By incorporating F-GINKGO into your routine, you may experience improved blood flow and the other positive effects associated with Ginkgo Biloba.

 

Studies have demonstrated that ginkgo extracts are more effective than beta-carotene and vitamin E in reducing UV-induced oxidative stress in epidermal cells. Furthermore, ginkgo increases the production of fibroblasts, collagen, and extracellular fibronectin. Ginkgo also contains glycosides or ginkgo heterosides, including quercetin, kaempferol, and isohamnetine.

Quercetin exhibits stronger antioxidant properties than vitamin C, along with membrane-stabilizing effects and the ability to scavenge free radicals. It enhances the utilization of oxygen and glucose.

Contact us for official distributors informations.

name: HYALURONIC PEEL
short_description:
To enhance our treatments, we have developed a pre-peel solution that plays a vital role in improving their effectiveness. This pre-peel treatment is designed to remove dead skin cells, thereby facilitating the deeper penetration of meso solutions. Our hyaluronic peel, featuring a gel formula with gluconolactone and hyaluronic acid, offers a synergistic exfoliation process with a slow drying effect.

Polyhydroxyacids, present in our formula, consist of:Relatively large moleculesAllowing them to gradually penetrate the skin, layer by layer.FUNCTIONThis gentle approach effectively removes dead skin cells without causing irritation. Found in our Hyaluronic Acid Peeling, Gluconolactone, a natural antioxidant, stands on par with the renowned antioxidants vitamin C and vitamin E in terms of effectiveness. Additionally, it plays a pivotal role in reducing inflammation by inhibiting the synthesis of pro-interleukin-1.

Furthermore, gluconolactone’s ability to facilitate the transfer of water molecules plays a central role in skin hydration. By reaching the granular layer of the skin, water causes a decline in calcium ion concentration, signaling the body to stimulate lipid synthesis in keratinocytes.

name: MESO LIFT CREAM
short_description:
We specially formulated our MESO LIFT CREAM with active ingredients typically found in mesotherapy and dermal fillers. This combination provides an effective solution for reducing skin sagging and wrinkles. This innovative cream works meticulously to redefine facial contours, delivering a more youthful and firmer appearance to your skin.

The cross-linked hyaluronic acid in this cream is derived from natural hyaluronic acid, similar to that used in dermal fillers. It exhibits a viscosity 2-3 times greater than regular hyaluronic acid solutions at the same concentration due to its cross-linked structure.This creamcontains cross-linked hyaluronic acid derived from natural hyaluronic acid, similar to that used in dermal fillers. It forms a breathable 3D layer on the skin’s surface, enhancing the skin barrier function, filling wrinkles, reducing water evaporation, and protecting against external aggressors like UV rays and pollution.

Our rejuvenating complex shares similarities with placental components, being rich in growth factors, folic acid, and acetyl glutamine. It serves as a comprehensive anti-aging solution, promoting skin repair, addressing wrinkles, and providing firmness and moisture.

This soft gel cream features hexyl-resorcinol and niacinamide, enhanced by a transdermal delivery system. It swiftly diminishes the appearance of pigmented spots, blemishes, and pigmentation.Effective when usedStudies show that Radiance whitening cream’s active ingredient, hexyl-resorcinol, is four times more effective than hydroquinone in achieving a radiant complexion.It achieves this by modulating multiple sites in the melanogenesis pathway.Additionally, it offers surprising functions such as increasing glutathione levels and stimulating antioxidant defense enzymes, including glutathione peroxidase and glutathione reductase.ConcludeNiacinamide is an excellent agent for improving skin hydration, as it regulates the expression of aquaporin-3 (AQP3). In this product, it collaborates with hexyl-resorcinol to enhance skin tone and reduce pigmentation.

name: EYE SORBET
short_description:
An ultra-refreshing eye cream formulated with active ingredients derived from aesthetic medicine, designed to minimize wrinkles within minutes. The innovation behind this product lies in its exclusive texture, which not only reduces skin temperature but also significantly enhances hydration.

It creates a soft-focus effect on wrinkles, effectively concealing them like a makeup primer. The cooling effect stimulates micro-circulation, promoting faster drainage of accumulated fluids and reducing the appearance of eye bags and dark circles.

This eye cream is further fortified with a blend of active ingredients dedicated to moisturizing and diminishing wrinkles in this delicate area. The cross-linked hyaluronic acid, a polymer derived from natural hyaluronic acid (HA), shares similarities with those used in dermal fillers.

Its unique cross-linked structure leads to a viscosity 2-3 times that of regular HA solutions at the same concentration. This indicates its ability to bind more water molecules, behaving like a ‘micro-reservoir’ that continuously delivers water to the skin. It forms a 3D ‘breathable’ layer on the skin’s surface, enhancing the skin barrier function, filling wrinkles, reducing water evaporation, and shielding against external aggressors like UV rays and pollution.

The rejuvenation complex features a composition similar to placenta extract, rich in growth factors, folic acid, and acetyl glutamine. This comprehensive anti-aging solution offers a multitude of benefits, including skin repair, wrinkle reduction, skin firming, and moisturizing.

name: CERAMID MOISTURIZER
short_description:
Our Ceramides Moisturizing Cream is rich and nutritive, featuring a water-in-oil solution specifically designed for dry and sensitive skin. With Vegan Ceramides extracted from rice through a specialized process that enhances sphingolipids and phospholipids, this cream reinforces the structure and quality of the skin’s stratum corneum.

Ceramides constitute the primary components of the intercellular lipid cement (40%), and they govern several crucial biological functions, including:The regulation of trans-epidermal water flow.The cohesion of stratum corneum layers.Skin protection.The restoration of the skin barrier.In a clinical study conducted on 11 healthy volunteers, Vegan Ceramides demonstrated significant improvements in skin hydration. The results showed an increase of +73% compared to the placebo after just 30 minutes and a 53% increase compared to the placebo after 8 hours.

name: MESO REPAIR CREAM
short_description:
Our “Meso Repair Cream” actively incorporates mesotherapy-derived components to aid in the skin’s effective repair after aesthetic medicine treatments.

Our advanced repair complex expedites the recovery process, demonstrating impressive results. After just 24 hours, it can reduce redness due to dry skin by up to 37%, and after 48 hours, by a remarkable 52%, when compared to a placebo. Moreover, it operates at the DNA level, offering protection against various forms of damage, particularly damage induced by UV exposure.

The unique ice cream-like texture of this product plays a pivotal role in its effectiveness. As it gently melts onto the skin, it lowers skin temperature, thereby diminishing redness and providing soothing relief. Additionally, the diverse waxes present in the composition create an ultra-protective barrier on the skin’s surface.

For an even more pronounced soothing effect, consider storing the cream in a cool place, ideally between 15 and 20 degrees Celsius.

name: CICA POST-CARE
short_description:
CICA, known for its healing properties, is essential for our skin, often considered our first line of defense, as it requires time to heal when damaged. Achieving a normal, healthy appearance doesn’t happen overnight. CICA assists in skin repair, but even with its help, difficulties can arise that potentially prolong the recovery process.

This challenge is particularly evident during pregnancy, leading to the appearance of stretch marks. During this time, the skin struggles to restructure itself correctly and often lacks firmness.IngredientEnter Titrated Extract of Centella asiatica, commonly known as CICA or Tiger grass.It represents a highly purified composition of some of the most potent molecules found within this plant.CICA works diligently to expedite the repair of damaged skin and restore its integrity.It achieves this by enhancing the production of vital proteins within the dermis and delivering a soothing effect.Our extract is sourced from wild Centella asiatica, harvested in Madagascar. In our formulation, we combine CICA with Provitamin B5, also known as panthenol, known for its ability to hydrate and promote skin integrity restoration.

When applied topically, panthenol penetrates the epidermis, where it is absorbed by skin cells and transformed into pantothenic acid. It is at this stage that it aids in the hydration of the stratum corneum. Additionally, panthenol helps strengthen the skin’s hydrolipidic film, effectively combatting water loss and dehydration.

name: RETINOL 1.0
short_description:

A fresh, Invigorating citrus blend Complements this product’s scent. The Breakthrough is our Stabilization of pure retinol, mixing it with select oils and antioxidants.

Pure retinol often loses its effectiveness in skincare products over a short period due to oxidation caused by light, dissolved oxygen in the product, and storage temperature fluctuations.

Many brands resort to using retinol derivatives, which exhibit significantly lower efficiency.Our unique blend of oils effectively:Shields retinol from oxidationPreserving over 80% of active retinol even after 12 months of storage.Manufacturing processDuring the manufacturing process, all oxygen is removed from the product through a vacuum process, and the product is then sealed in airless bottles.

Additionally, the formulation includes a transdermal booster to enhance retinol penetration into the deepest layers of the epidermis.

name: NIACINAMIDE 5.0
short_description:
A Highly Concentrated Formula. This powerful serum targets redness, dry Skin-induced itching, Pigmentation issues, and Impurities. Niacinamide, Extensively studied and recognized as a top Skincare ingredient, serves as the core active element.

It boasts a wealth of skin benefits, Affirmed by numerous studies, including Brightening the Complexion, Diminishing acne and Blemishes, Bolstering the skin barrier, and Restoring balance to the skin’s Micro-biome.

Niacinamide has a Demonstrably positive effect on reducing skin Pigmentation, leading to a more even and uniform skin tone.

By positively influencing AQP3 expression, this NIACINAMIDE 5.0 ingredient leads to a remarkable improvement in skin hydration.Aquaporins (AQPs) are a family of transport proteins crucial for the movement of water and small solutes across cell membranes.Niacinamide actively influences the expression of several proteins that are crucial for establishing and preserving the skin’s moisture barrier.It also plays a role in regulating the skin microbiome by reducing the levels and growth of C. acnes, which contributes to a reduction in blemishes. Consequently, applying a NIACINAMIDE 5.0 serum twice daily shows exceptional efficacy, especially for individuals with oily skin, who note the most significant benefits.

name: F-HAIR MEN
short_description:
A Comprehensive Solution for Hair Loss. Hair loss (alopecia) is a common problem for people of all genders. Consequently, understanding the hair growth process is crucial for addressing this issue. Androgenic alopecia, the most common type of hair loss, affects 95% of people who experience hair loss.

Hair has two main parts: the hair shaft (the strand you see) and the hair follicle (the root under your skin). At the bottom of the follicle is a tiny bump called the papilla and a special area called the extracellular matrix (ECM).

name: EXOSOMES SERUM
short_description:
Exosomes Serum is a scientifically advanced skincare solution designed to strengthen, hydrate, and protect the skin.
This lightweight serum combines cutting-edge ingredients including Lactobacillus Exosomes, Ectoin, Squalane, and Rice Extracted Ceramides to deliver lasting hydration, reinforce the skin’s natural barrier, and shield against environmental stressors. Lactobacillus Exosomes, the primary ingredient, represents a breakthrough in microbiome skincare. Exosomes are tiny extracellular vesicles derived from Lactobacillus bacteria, naturally carrying beneficial bioactive molecules that support cell communication and renewal. When applied topically, these exosomes work to bolster the skin’s natural defenses, promote a balanced microbiome, and encourage a healthier, more resilient barrier.
